Source code

Find the source code on Github at https://github.com/skohlmann/GBC-Ball-Counter.
Duration in milliseconds between capturing two images to check for passing balls.
Duration in milliseconds between capturing the next image after detecting a ball.
The difference of the brightness between foreground and background to detected a ball.
The difference of the brightness between foreground and background to detected a white ball.
Minimum value in percent of detected changes to signal a passing ball.
Ball group contains white balls (e.g. soccer balls)?
No white balls in ball group.
Ball group contains white balls.\n\nWARNING: this may increase false-positive ball counts.
The minimum color difference between the background color and the foreground color to detect a colored ball.
Brightness only based ball detection mode for Android 5.0 is not in use (default).

Android 5.0 brightness only based ball detection mode is in use (not default). Switch on "Ball group contains white balls (e.g. soccer balls)?" to change minimum brightness difference.\n\nWARNING: this may increase false-positive ball counts. Color detection has no effect.
